net.sf.jclec.selector

Class StochasticSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractSelector
      • net.sf.jclec.selector.StochasticSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ISelector, ITool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomSelector, RouletteSelector, StochasticRemainingSelector, StochasticUniversalSampling, TournamentSelector

    public abstract class StochasticSelector
extends AbstractSelector
    Stochastic (random) selector. Use a random numbers generator to perform the selection operation. This random generator is taken from execution context.
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
